md:
giải nghĩa từ "setting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Setting /ˈsetɪŋ/ (noun)

* Meaning: The time and place in which a story, film, or play takes place.
* Example: The setting of the novel is in the 19th century in rural England.
* Related words: scene, backdrop, environment, context
* Antonyms: plot, storyline

Setting (verb)

* Meaning: To put something in a particular position or location.
* Example: She set the vase on the table.
* Related words: place, put, locate, position
* Antonyms: remove, take away

Setting (noun)

* Meaning: A particular arrangement or configuration of something.
* Example: The setting on the camera was incorrect.
* Related words: configuration, arrangement, layout, adjustment
* Antonyms: default, standard

Note: The word "setting" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. The above explanations are just a few examples of its meanings.
